descriptionHtml:
Whiterun Breezehome Basement

[youtube]WNeG0W3muW0[/youtube]

Description

This mod adds a new area to the player house in Whiterun. 
The Breezehome Basement is added as a new cell, accessible 
through a trap door beneath the stairs of the house.
If there are any bugs please inform me so I can fix them straight away.
This is my first mod, i hope you will like it.

Features

- Enchanting Table
- Navmeshed
- 2 Weapon Plaque Displays
- 4 Weapon Racks
- 3 Mannequin
- 1 Weapon Display Case
- Bath with Sauna
- Safe with Key
- Trap door entrace

Knowing Issues

- Incompatible with mods which have the same entrace location
- If your mannequins move around or armor disappears, try this mod:
   Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10652
- companion dont follow into basement (fixed v1.2)

Future Plan

- purchase: player have to buy it from Proventus Avenicci

Installation

- Copy the contents of my mod Data folder into your Skyrim Data folder
- or Use NMM to install

Updates

v1.1

- picture frame fixed
- false mirrored wallmap fixed

v1.2

- navmesh fixed
- idle markers added

v1.3

added Purchase from: Proventus Avenicci (3000 Gold)

v1.4 (not released)

purchase fix 

Other Mod - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18533/



[IMG]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120610/hrl3m6h9.jpg[/IMG]

Credits

author: Barrog
